website_summaries.verdict: Praised as head-turning light-up sneakers that look even better in person. Their durability, however, gets mixed reviews.
pros: Open wide, so they're easy to slip on and off little feet
Hook-and-loop closure instead of tie laces
Most find them to be very comfortable
Lights activate when child takes a step, so they do not drain the battery
cons: Some say they wish shoes were more durable
Occasional reports of one shoe arriving not lighting up

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of box, but exchanged and now ok.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box one of the 3 lights on one of the shoes doesn't work. Kid hasn't even put them on yet. *edit* Within a week they sent out a new pair of shoes that worked perfectly. 2nd pair was perfect. Little big of a hassle but at least they took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sizes don't match.
customer_reviews.text: Why is it that a size 9 Adidas shoes is not the same size as a size 9 sketchers shoe? Also why does the size chart only list comparisons between countries rather than actual length and width. Metric or standard would be adequate.
customer_reviews.author: adam klarr

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are so very lightweight and looks cool.The shoe opens plenty wide ,extremely comfortable to easily put the shoe on and the velcro strap holds very well, so there is no worry about the shoe coming off while running and jumping around.
customer_reviews.author: Alex.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, affordable shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted light up shoes for her birthday and she LOVES these! She just finished jumping around the house in them. Great price, seem like good quality and they are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Leah E.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These Skechers Kids' Litebeams-Gleam N'dream Sneaker are exactly what I expected and my great granddaughter loves them...she put them right on and has worn them ever since, no problem with them irritating her feet (that is a HUGE PLUS) . They are the shoes she wants to wear all the time. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: PapaJohn

customer_reviews.title: Well made and kid approved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and they light up very brightly so I always know which two feet belong to my daughter at night
customer_reviews.author: nfallbach

customer_reviews.title: Look used
customer_reviews.text: 1Box was taped up all over 2 no tissue ,as shoes were thrown in 3 shoes sizing was off, TOO Small 4 looked as if they were returned and put inside. Definitely returning,should get every cent back!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Ripped and falling apart within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fell apart in less than 2 months. My daughter has had sketchers before and they fit and held up really well. These shoes are really cool and the light up option is amazing but I am so disappointed that these shoes honestly look terrible and need replacing in less than 2 months. How can this be???!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried when they came in and I saw they had lights. My very confident 12 year old, didn’t even care. She loves them. I love the bold colors. They look even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: A. Langston

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and fit my daughter great. My daughter has to have special braces on her feet so I'm usually pretty apprehensive about buying shoes online but these fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them!! She seem big but they do not flop off just gives room to grow. All in all we love love. The colors are so bright and the light up is super cool
customer_reviews.author: Oceangirl

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter!! Fit as described. She lives the lights!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4 yr old niece for her birthday and she loved them! They are great quality and light up whenever she takes a step! She is thrilled so I am thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: D. Weiler

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They are comfortable, cute and easy to get on. She gets lots of comments on how cute they are.
customer_reviews.author: jennipoo

customer_reviews.title: One shoe lights up—defective
customer_reviews.text: Only one shoe lights up and this was a Christmas present which my daughter refuses to let go of for us to return it...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great light up sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for sketchers and fit my daughter perfect! Only thing is it had an ink smudge on the toe part but she didn't seem to mind😊
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: They were ok
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoes but the toes get dirty fast and hard to clean don’t come clean basically
customer_reviews.author: Srb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these sneakers! Lots of people loved them too!! Huge hit with her tween friends!
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: One shoe does not light up. These were given as a gift so pretty disappointing for my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte F.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves. She has very narrow feet and fit very well. Washed after a mud fest and are still lighting up and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Jarrels

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves them. She and her sister both like to dance in them and light up the night!
customer_reviews.author: John Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: They are nice shoes. But they run small if you’re comparing them to Carter’s .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: somewhat lightweight, attractive shoe
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is happy with the color and the lights. I am also happy with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ho

customer_reviews.title: Every little girl loves light up shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are perfect!!! My grandaughter loves them!! Beautiful shoes!!! Shipment and pricing was the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Zollinger

customer_reviews.title: They light up. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. All my girl will wear. They should just make light up everything.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel U.

customer_reviews.title: Eventually she wore them
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves them, I got a size bigger just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Fidel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, comfortable. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes these skechers. Excellent quality, comfortable. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: The sneakers are awesome
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so excited with her new shoes, she didn’t want to take them off!! It was a Mimi win!! 💕
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly LaKari

customer_reviews.title: I can run super fast and super high jumps
customer_reviews.text: My daughter rates sneakers on how she can jump and run in them. She said, I can run super fast and super high jumps!! They are great fit really good.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Roche

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect! They are so pretty my daughter loves! They light up too!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay hubert

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Narrow, a little tight. But very well constructed shoe. Great lights, my 2.5 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Dn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these shoes! They’re super cute, fit great, and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely love these shoes. They look nice and are of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lanita Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grand daughter, and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes! They fit so perfect and she loves the lights.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn stephens

customer_reviews.title: They're adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers is the ONLY shoes my granddaughter will wear. They light up and she loves them. Toddler approved!
customer_reviews.author: Lasha

customer_reviews.title: Fun kids’ shoes
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great and are so fun! My granddaughter loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: So so cute! Really bright lights! My 20 month old loves these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jason T Kercheval

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves!
customer_reviews.text: fits well, super cute, lights are different colors. very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D. Grant

customer_reviews.title: The color is very vibrant.
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my 2 year old granddaughter she loves them! They are true to size and seems to be very comfortable and they are very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kid n play

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved the lights when she walks
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved them but I noticed they were somewhat a little bit larger but she is just between sizes so decided to keep them as they will fit her in a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wer bit tight
customer_reviews.text: They fit my daughter's feet, just a little tight to hey on
customer_reviews.author: James Munstis

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe reflects what to expect of the Skechers brand, quality, style, and a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam is the bomb
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the lights and that the shoe is so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kellye DuBoise

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, my kid liked it, very good for walking distances
customer_reviews.author: Maram

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with fit and the colors
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter (8) loves these. The lights were a hint along with the pretty colors. These don't slip in the heels.
customer_reviews.author: tenabunny

product_meta.title: Skechers Kids' Litebeams-Gleam N'dream Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Lighted athletic sneaker with foiled satin details

Skechers is an award-winning global leader in the lifestyle footwear industry that designs, develops, and markets lifestyle footwear that appeals to trend-savvy men, women and children. The company's success stems from it's high quality, diversified, and affordable product line that meets consumers' various lifestyle needs. Since it's inception in 1992, the Skechers diverse product offering has grown from utility style boots to include seven Skechers brands and five uniquely branded fashion lines for men and women.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Colorful lights in midsole light up with every step!
Adjustable side hook and loop closure
